name: Hook, Line and Thinker
description:
[ Please note this is a very old version of the game made in 6 days as part of Fishing Jam 2. I am actively working on the game and you can follow my progress on Twitter ]

Hook, Line and Thinker by Connor Halford (@rhythm_lynx)

Use the arrow keys to move and Z to reel in your hook. X to restart the level, S to return to the menu.

If you're curious, I wrote a devlog every day of the jam, which you can read here.

Please feel free to post a comment here or tweet me your thoughts! :)
